created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the test case

created_on.description: The date/time when the test case was created (as UNIX timestamp)

id.description: The unique ID of the test case

milestone_id.description: The ID of the milestone that is linked to the test case

priority_id.description: The ID of the priority that is linked to the test case

section_id.description: The ID of the section the test case belongs to

suite_id.description: The ID of the suite the test case belongs to

title.description: The title of the test case

type_id.description: The ID of the test case type that is linked to the test case

template_id.description: The ID of the template (field layout) the test case uses (requires TestRail 5.2 or later)

updated_by.description: The ID of the user who last updated the test case

updated_on.description: The date/time when the test case was last updated (as UNIX timestamp)
